title: Online Teacher Professional Development: Asynchronous Collaboration and Task-Based Deep Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in online learning tools and foundational knowledge in language education
context.additional_context: Program combining asynchronous discussions and assignments in VR-based simulation environments to enhance language education expertise for teachers who are office workers aged 40+

learning_goals: Learners can analyze language education theories and practical cases, and provide critical feedback through online asynchronous discussions.
Learners can design and apply language teaching strategies in VR environments through task-based learning (article reviews, simulation practice).
Learners can propose specific improvement plans for peers' instructional design proposals through peer assessment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
